page.title: 08HEALTH PROVISION DONAGHADEE
page.content:
The{Health Centre}was opened in October 1979. Four doctors sharing the practice have their surgeries there.
Other services which the centre provides are :-
Chiropody Clinic __ 1\ days per week Speech Therapy __ 1 day a fortnight Baby Clinic __ Tuesday afternoons Dental Clinic __ By arrangement.
There are two dentists, an optician and a chiropodist with private practices.
The{Eastern Health Board}provide two District Nurses, three Health Visitors a Resident Nurse and Social Workers.
